title.rendered: “IDF Intercepts Unmanned Aircraft from Lebanese Territory: Latest Developments in Southern Lebanon Terrorism”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF intercepted an unmanned aircraft that crossed from Lebanese territory: Terrorists attacked in southern Lebanon

Following the alarm activated a short time ago in the area of the city of Acre, the air defense fighters successfully intercepted an unmanned aircraft that crossed into the country from Lebanon. A rocket and missile fire warning was activated due to the fear of falling interception debris.

Earlier today, fighter jets attacked a military building in the Al-Nakura area where a terrorist cell was identified. In addition, a terrorist was attacked who was identified in the Yarun area.
